entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Port Elgin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:54 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 3:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -4.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -9.5°C
Wind: WNW 19 km/h gust 34 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls in the morning and early in the afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
